abstract: History of the World in 100 Objects, a four-year project involving 100 curators aiming to tell the history of the world with objects from the British Museum's sprawling collection, is highlighted in a popular BBC radio series and a hit book published of the series.
snippet: “The History of the World in 100 Objects,” from the British Museum, was an intriguing and popular BBC radio series and is now a book that will be available in the United States on Monday.
lead_paragraph: “The History of the World in 100 Objects,” from the British Museum, was an intriguing and popular BBC radio series and is now a book that will be available in the United States on Monday.

headline.seo: ‘History of the World in 100 Objects,’ From British Museum
